attributes.action: Give fathers the natural right to have contact with children shared equal basis
attributes.additional_details: This is wrong. Most accusations by the other partner use the court system which is flawed.
attributes.background:
Fathers do not have any rights to have normal contact with their children.
Fathers only have given rights which are easily removed.
The courts have to act on any accusation by the mother to suspend rights of the father and stop contact.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168943
